11-15.text: Blade misses foe's face by inches. You receive initiative next round.

16-20.text: Strike passes under foe's arm. It fails to bite deep. He recoils.

21-35.text: Foe's evasion puts him out of an aggressive posture.

36-45.text: Minor thigh wound. Cut foe with the smallest of slashes.

46-50.text: Blow to foe's back. Foe attempts to ward you off with a wild swing.

51-55.text: Blow to foe's chest. Foe stumbles back and puts up a feeble guard.

56-60.text: You recover from your initial swing and bring edge across foe's thigh.

61-65.text: You feign high and strike low. Slash foe in back of upper leg.

66-66.text: Foe blocks your attack with his shield arm. Shoulder is broken and arm is useless. You have initiative.

67-70.text: Strike lands close against foe's neck. Foe is horrified.

71-75.text: Blow falls on lower leg. Slash tendons. Poor sucker.

76-80.text: Foe goes low, but you still catch his upper arm. It's a bleeder.

81-85.text: Foe steps right into your swing. You make a large wound.

86-90.text: Foe turns out and away from your swing. You still catch his side.

91-95.text: Blow to foe's head. If no helmet, cut off foe's ear (all hearing ability is halved).

96-99.text: The tip of your weapon slashes foe's nose. Minor wound and a permanent scar.

100-100.text: Strike severs carotid artery and jugular vein, breaking foe's neck. Foe dies in 6 rounds of agony.

1-5.text: Feeble strike falls clear of target.

6-10.text: Hard strike with no edge. Foe steps clear before you sort it out.

11-15.text: Foe steps quickly out of your reach. You receive initiative next round.

16-20.text: Blow to foe's side. Foe defends energetically.

21-35.text: Foe is shaken by your blow to his side. His defensive measures look clumsy.

36-45.text: Strike foe in shin. If he doesn't have greaves, you slash open foe's shin.

46-50.text: Foe twists oddly to avoid your attack. Blow strikes foe's back.

51-55.text: Quality strike. Minor chest wound. If foe has armor, he only staggers. If not, the wound is effective.

56-60.text: Edge makes contact well enough. Minor thigh wound.

61-65.text: Nick foe in his forearm. Wound bleeds surprisingly strongly.

66-66.text: Your strike misses torso and breaks foe's elbow. Foe drops his weapon and his weapon arm is useless.

67-70.text: Your attempt to behead foe almost works. Neck strike. Foe is not happy.

71-75.text: Slash muscle in foe's calf. Foe is in too much pain to regain footing quickly.

76-80.text: Foe moves his shield arm too slowly. You gladly slash his arm.

81-85.text: Your edge bites half its width into foe. Open up a terrible wound. Blood goes everywhere.

86-90.text: Strike to to back. Foe goes prone trying to to avoid your strike. He gets up facing the wrong direction.

91-95.text: Strike to foe's hip. The blow has little edge, but much impact. Your blow staggers foe. His recovery is slow.

96-99.text: Strike to foe's head breaks skull and causes massive brain damage. Foe drops and dies in 6 rounds.

100-100.text: Disembowel foe, killing him instantly. 25% chance your weapon is stuck in opponent for 1 round.

01-05.text: Firm shot. Good recovery. Try again.

06-10.text: Strike foe with more force than edge.

11-15.text: Blow to foe's side yields the initiative to you next round.

16-20.text: Your assault catches foe in side and forces him back 5 feet.

21-35.text: You break foe's rib with a lightning strike to his chest. He recovers quickly. His shield side still faces you.

36-45.text: The blow does nothing more than open a wide cut in foe.

46-50.text: Blow to foe's back. Foe twists out of it and you turn your weapon to magnify the wound. Foe yells out.

51-55.text: Blow lands solidly upon foe's chest. You get some slashing action, but not a mortal wound.

56-60.text: Strike to side slips down onto foe's thigh. The wound is effective.

61-65.text: Catch part of foe's forearm. You make a long slice in foe's arm.

66-66.text: Your swing falls short when foe leaps back. You shatter foe's knee. Foe is knocked down.

67-70.text: Slash foe's neck. Your weapon cuts neck garments (and armor) free.

71-75.text: Slash muscle and tendons in foe's lower leg. Foe stumbles forward into you with his guard down.

76-80.text: You come in high and fast. Slash muscle and tendons in foe's shield arm. Foe's arm is useless.

81-85.text: You follow your training well. You extend on your slashing arc. Strike lands against foe's side.

86-90.text: Blast to back breaks bone. Foe stumbles forward before falling down. He is having trouble standing.

91-95.text: Chop the top of foe's thigh. Sever foe's leg. Foe drops immediately and dies in 6 rounds due to shock and blood loss.

96-99.text: You cleave shield and arm in half Foe attempts to catch his falling arm. Foe is in shock for 12 rounds then dies.

100-100.text: Strike up, in, and across foe's forehead. Destroy foe's eyes. Foe flips onto his back in pain.

06-10.text: An opening appears and all you can to is smack foe lightly.

11-15.text: You force your opponent back. He keeps smack foe lightly.

16-20.text: You lean in and slash foe's side. You receive initiative next round.

21-35.text: Arm and chest strike. Foe cannot defend himself for a moment. You step around his shielded side.

36-45.text: Foe blocks your attack on his chest. You slash foe's upper area.

46-50.text: Reach long and catch foe in his lower back. He twists out of it, but is unbalanced.

51-55.text: Heavy blow to upper torso. Wound falls open and foe is in pain. His guard is still up, amazingly enough.

56-60.text: Tip of your blade gets a hit on foe's thigh. You twist your weapon.

61-65.text: You are lucky to strike foe's forearm while recovering from a lunge.

66-66.text: You knock foe out for 6 hours with a strike to side of head. If foe has no helm you kill him instantly.

67-70.text: Strike down foe's defenses with a blow to both arms.

71-75.text: Slash muscle and sever tendons in foe's lower leg. He can't stand much longer. His guard is feeble.

76-80.text: Foe mistakenly brings his weapon arm across your blade. Sever tendons. Foe's arm is limp and useless.

81-85.text: You plunge your weapon into foe's stomach. Major abdomenal wound. Foe is instantly pale from blood loss.

86-90.text: Your attempt to disarm foe is even more effective. Sever opponent's hand. Foe is in shock for 6 rounds and then dies.

91-95.text: Sever foe's weapon arm and bury your sword into foe's side. Foe falls prone Foe is in shock for 12 rounds, then dies.

96-99.text: Slash foe's side. Foe dies in 3 rounds due to internal organ damage. Foe is down and unconscious immediately.

100-100.text: Impale foe in heart. Foe dies instantly. Heart is destroyed. 25% chance your weapon is stuck in for 2 rounds.

06-10.text: Unbalance foe. You receive initiative next round.

11-15.text: You push aside foe's weapon and force him back.

16-20.text: Strong blow to foe's ribs. Foe drops his guard and almost his weapon.

21-35.text: Foe avoids your main effort, but you nick him on your recovery. Foe receives minor side wound and stumbles back 10 feet.

36-45.text: Blow to foe's upper leg. Leg armor helps block the blow.

46-50.text: Strike to foe's stomach. He doubles over in pain and you pull your sword clean with one more sweep.

51-55.text: Cut foe open with little grace. You are unsure of your success until you see all the blood coming out of his chest.

56-60.text: Thigh wound. Your blow cuts deep and severs an important vein.

61-65.text: Foe tries to disarm you and pays with a nasty cut to his forearm.

66-66.text: Block foe's weapon arm away and then sever it. Foe drops immediately and expires in 12 rounds. Good shot!

67-70.text: Slash tendons and crush the bones in foe's shield arm shoulder. Arm is useless.

71-75.text: Slash foe's lower leg and sever muscle and tendons. Foe will fall without something to lean against.

76-80.text: Foe reaches out to block your blow. You sever two fingers and break his shield arm making it useless.

81-85.text: Sever opponent's hand. Sad. Foe is down and in shock for 12 rounds, then dies.

86-90.text: Meat chopping strike severs foe's leg. Foe drops and lapses in unconsciousness. Foe dies in 9 rounds.

91-95.text: Sever foe's spine. Foe collapses, paralyzed from the neck down permanently.

96-99.text: Strike to foe's head destroys brain and makes life difficult for the poor fool. Foe expires in a heap—immediately.

100-100.text: Very close! Strike to foe's groin area. All vital organs are destroyed immediately. Foe dies after 24 rounds of agony.
